TI_TEXT.P: Музикални инструменти и части за музикални инструменти
Instruments de musique et pièces pour instruments de musique
Instrumente muzicale şi piese pentru acestea

TITLE.P: ECaM Supply and Delivery of a range of Musical Instruments for Children

SHORT_DESCR.P: The Authority is seeking to establish a framework agreement for the supply and delivery of a range of musical instruments, complete with suitably durable accessories and associated maintenance equipment, for children aged 7 to 11 years (School years 3, 4, 5 and 6) in 14 separate packages. The Musical Instruments and associated accessories are to be delivered to schools and other sites within the London Borough of Newham. The Authority will require a bulk quantity of musical instruments and accessories in the first 2 weeks of September of each year.plus the supply of smaller numbers of additional instruments and accessories throughout the year. The framework agreement will be subject to available financial resources, supplier performance and flexibility to meet changing demand. In addition, there will be no form of exclusivity or volume that is guaranteed under the resultant framework agreement and the Authority will be.
